description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the secure boot security feature bypass vulnerability (CVE-2024-37972):

1. Download the appropriate update package for your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update Catalog.
2. Install the update on your system.
3. Restart your computer to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- The updates address a stack-based buffer overflow that could allow for a security feature bypass.
- For Windows 11 Version 23H2 and 22H2, you can install KB5040442. Other builds may require different KB updates like KB5040431 and KB5040427.
- It's essential to check your current Windows build number and ensure the respective KB is appropriate for your system.
- Update links:
  - [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442)
  - [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
  - [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure that your system is running a compatible version of Windows 10 or Windows 11.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
- Restart the system post-installation to ensure effective implementation of the update.
